fn.p: Suggested citation for this article: Martelli P, Teng JLL, Lee F-K, Yeong K-Y, Fong JYH, Hui S-W, et al. Influenza A(H1N1)pdm09 virus infection in a captive giant panda, Hong Kong. Emerg Infect Dis. 2019 Dec [ date cited]. https://doi.org/10.3201/eid2512.191143
These authors contributed equally to this article.
